attributes.action: Yemen Crisis Appeal. Save Lives. Save Families. Save Their Country.
attributes.additional_details: We have the facilities and supplies to support the people of Yemen, yet we stay quiet? Why do we stay quiet? We want support from the government. We want the government to bring awareness. The people of Yemen should be able to walk their streets freely, without fear for their lives. The government do have the capability of doing this. Save their country, help us save their country.
attributes.background: Save lives and save families! Why Yemen need our help? Everyday, the people of Yemen suffer. They suffer while we leave our luxurious lives but we would want help if that was us. We need the awareness to be spread. Spread Awareness for the people of Yemen. Let them feel safe again!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign and share these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326822
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326932
